Detailed Description

Internal body class for OBEX objects.

Warning;
This is an internal implementation class which must not be used outside APOXI OBEX at all.

The class extends the interface ReferableObject to implement reference-counted shared access to its instances which are managed exclusively by class ObexObject. Manipulations of the reference counter are protected by means of a semaphore, making ObexObjectData instances suitable for data exchange among different execution contexts such as APOXI applications and stack processes.
